<rule id="javax-to-jakarta-dependencies-00006" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="pom.xml" pattern="groupId>javax<"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                    <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="javax groupId has been replaced by jakarta.platform">
                        <message>Update group dependency by replacing the `javax` groupId with `jakarta.platform`</message>
                        <link href="https://jakarta.ee/" title="Jakarta EE"/>
                        <quickfix name="javax-to-jakarta-pom-dependencies-javax" type="REPLACE">
                               <replacement>jakarta.platform</replacement>
                               <search>javax</search>
                        </quickfix>
                    </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
